headline: Behr Paint Company Reveals its 2025 Exterior Stain Color of the Year, "Cedar," Alongside Annual Curb Appeal Collection
summary: Behr Paint Company has selected Cedar, a warm, earthy hue inspired by the natural tones of cedarwood, as its 2025 Exterior Stain Color of the Year. The launch comes as 82% of homeowners are choosing to invest in the look and feel of their current home instead of buying a new home this year, according to a new study by Behr.

headline: Masco (MAS): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Masco’s shares (currently trading at $70.99) have posted a disappointing 14.7% loss while the S&P 500 was down 1.7%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.

content.title: Masco (MAS): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
content.summary: Over the past six months, Masco’s shares (currently trading at $70.99) have posted a disappointing 14.7% loss while the S&P 500 was down 1.7%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
